General.Name: Equatorial Pará Distribuidora de Energia S.A
General.Description: Equatorial Pará Distribuidora de Energia S.A. engages in the distribution of electricity for residential, industrial, commercial, and corporate customers in the state of Pará. It serves 144 municipalities comprising approximately 461,680customers. The company was founded in 1962 and is headquartered in Belém, Brazil. Equatorial Pará Distribuidora de Energia S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Equatorial Energia S.A.
General.Address: Rodovia Augusto Montenegro, s/n, Km 8.5, Belém, PA, Brazil, 66823-010
